TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBindingCollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because DataBindings editing is launched via a DesignerActionList instead of the property grid. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: Fornece um conversor de tipo para objetos .

span.span: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este conversor de tipo chama a base de método para todos os tipos de destino, exceto , para o qual uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") será retornado.This type converter calls the base method for all destination types except , for which an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object, destinationType As Type) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, System::Object ^ value, Type ^ destinationType);

param.name: context
param.span: Um que indica o componente ou controle ao qual a coleção de associação de dados pertence.

span.span: An that indicates the component or control to which the data binding collection belongs.

param.name: culture
param.span: Uma que pode ser usada para fornecer informações de cultura adicionais.

span.span: A that can be used to provide additional culture information.

param.name: destinationType
param.span: O tipo para o qual converter.

summary.span: Converte uma coleção de associação de dados no tipo especificado.

span.span: Converts a data binding collection to the specified type.

returns.span: O objeto produzido pela conversão de tipo.

span.span: The object produced by the type conversion.

returns.span: Se o parâmetro for do tipo , esse método retornará uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

span.span: If the parameter is of type , this method returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método retorna uma cadeia de caracteres vazia se o `destinationType` parâmetro é do tipo .This method returns an empty string if the `destinationType` parameter is of type . Caso contrário, este método chama o método da base de classe.Otherwise this method calls the method of the base class.
